title: Jimin & Jung Kook of BTS Reunite for Season 2 of ‘Are You Sure?!’: First Two Episodes Live Now
summary: The duo travels across Switzerland and Vietnam together after completing their military service.
body: Reunited, and it feels so good! On Wednesday (Dec. 3), Jimin and Jung Kook of the Billboard chart-topping BTS premiered the first two episodes of the second season of their hit travel reality series Are You Sure?! Now streaming on Disney+, the two new episodes find the duo reuniting one week after completing their military service; both stars enlisted on Dec. 12, 2023, and were formally discharged earlier this year (June 11). As they begin their 12-day journey from Switzerland to Vietnam, Jimin and Jung Kook immerse themselves in local scenes and cultures, the beauty of nature, and a slew of surprises and thrills. Related Here’s How to Watch Season Two of BTS’ Jimin & Jung Kook’s Show ‘Are You Sure?!’ Cardi B Snuggles With Newborn Son, Calls Him Her Little 'Cuddle Buddy' Bad Bunny Is Spotify's Biggest Artist of 2025: See the Global Top Lists Season 2 of Are You Sure?! will consist of eight episodes, with two episodes dropping every Wednesday through Christmas Eve (Dec. 24). In the show’s first season, Jimin and Jung Kook explored iconic spots like New York, Jeju Island and Sapporo. A new season of Are You Sure?! also mean…
